casebody.data:
SKANSKA USA BUILDING INC., Appellant,
v.
ATLANTIC YARDS B2 OWNER, LLC, et al., Respondents, et al., Defendants. 2017-1220 Court of Appeals of New York. January 9, 2018

Motion by New York State Urban Development Corporation &c., et al. for leave to file a brief amici curiae on the appeal herein granted and the proposed brief is accepted as filed. Three copies of the brief must be served, an original and nine copies filed and the brief submitted in digital format within seven days.
